Control.ttp: esThis page provides information related to Security Settings.
esThe username used for logging into the PAC.
esWhen checked, indicates no password is required for this user to login to the PAC.
esThe password used for logging into the PAC.
esThe password used for logging into the PAC. (Must match the password entered above.)
esWhen checkmarked, indicates that this user is currently enabled.
esDate and time this user was first added to the database.
esDate and time of the last modifications made to this user.
esLevel of access granted to this user.
esClick to display online help related to this page...
esClick to begin adding a new user...
esClick to indicate the selected user should be removed once the Save button is clicked...
esClick to save the current user information to the database...
esClick to refresh the contents of this page...
esClick to collapse all the groups in the grid...
esClick to expand all the groups in the grid...
esThe username used for logging into the PAC
esIndicates the level of access granted to this user.
esThe date and time the user was added to the database.
esThe date and time of the last modification.
esIndicates whether the user is currently enabled or not.
esThe date and time the user last accessed the database via the corresponding IP Address.
esThe IP Address(es) the user accessed the database from.

Messages.Message: esPassword must be at least {0} characters in length.
esNew Password and Confirm Password must match.
esUsername must be at least {0} characters in length.
